shortDescription.en: Start earning yield on your crypto in just 3 clicks. Enjoy staking, liquid staking, yield vaults, and lending pools covering more than 40 blockchain networks and 400+ yield opportunities all in one place.

description.en: Yield.xyz is the world's most powerful self-custodial yield platform. Covering more than 40 blockchain networks and 400+ yield opportunities, Yield.xyz aggregates all yields across all chains and across all major DeFi providers in one place: be it staking, liquid staking, yield vaults, or lending protocols
